name: xapi-jqm
tagline: Integration of xAPI with jQuery Mobile
body:
### What?
Integration of [Experience API (xAPI)](http://xapi.adlnet.gov) with [jQuery Mobile](http://jquerymobile.com/) with course examples and templates to get you started.

### Who?
Intended for teachers, instructional designers, developers and more!

### Where?
Version: pre-alpha, don't expect much yet.
Content in progress, integration with xAPI not yet public until content is prepared.

### How?
Demo coming soon and documentation for usage coming soon.

### Why?
A method to develop flexible learning materials that integrate with your Learning Record Store (LRS).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
